metadata.title: CVE-2017-5209 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description:
The base64decode function in base64.c in libimobiledevice libplist through1.12 allows attackers to obtain sensitive information from process memoryor cause a denial of service (buffer over-read) via split encoded AppleProperty List data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5209` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libplist++3v5 - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
libplist-utils - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
libplist3 - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
python-plist - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libplist package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3').
